item.title: COP
item.description: score:-41 Chances: ConocoPhillips (COP) has been adding to its free cash flow, indicating potential for growth and profitability. The recent retirement of Dominic Macklon, executive vice president, may signal internal changes as the company looks to the future. Risks: The sale of shares by Christopher Delk, Vice President, Controller, may raise concerns about insider confidence in the company.
